title: Mercury Transit in the 8th House for Capricorn Ascendant
summary: When Mercury transits the 8th house for Capricorn Ascendant, thinking turns investigative, strategic, and deeply analytical. You may feel drawn to uncover hidden information, analyze shared finances, or resolve complex emotional matters. Conversations around trust, secrets, and long-term security intensify. This phase favors research, audits, and problem-solving behind the scenes. However, overthinking or suspicion can create mental stress. Progress comes by using Mercury’s clarity with discretion, allowing insight to drive transformation without anxiety.

sections.title: Finance
points: Focus on shared assets and taxes

closing: This Mercury transit sharpens Capricorn Ascendants’ insight into complex matters. Discretion turns analysis into constructive transformation.
